description: Search result fixtures for a typical tech startup - NovaTech Systems
raw_mcp_response:
1. NovaTech Systems - Autonomous Vehicle Technology
   URL: https://novatech.io
   Summary: NovaTech Systems is building the future of autonomous driving. Our advanced sensor fusion and perception systems power next-generation vehicles.

2. NovaTech Systems | Crunchbase
   URL: https://www.crunchbase.com/organization/novatech-systems
   Summary: NovaTech Systems is an autonomous vehicle technology company. Founded: 2019. Funding: $25M Series A. Employees: 75-100. Headquarters: Austin, TX.

3. NovaTech Systems - We're Hiring!
   URL: https://novatech.io/careers
   Summary: Join our mission to revolutionize transportation. Open roles: Senior ML Engineer, Embedded Systems Developer, Computer Vision Researcher.

4. NovaTech Systems demonstrates breakthrough in LiDAR processing - IEEE Spectrum
   URL: https://spectrum.ieee.org/novatech-lidar
   Summary: NovaTech's new algorithm achieves 40% faster LiDAR point cloud processing, enabling real-time object detection at highway speeds.

5. NovaTech Systems CEO on future of AVs - The Verge Interview
   URL: https://www.theverge.com/novatech-interview
   Summary: Exclusive interview with NovaTech CEO Sarah Chen on their approach to Level 4 autonomy and plans for 2025 commercial deployment.

news_items.title: NovaTech Systems raises $25M Series A for autonomous vehicle tech
news_items.summary: Austin-based NovaTech Systems has secured $25 million in Series A funding to accelerate development of their sensor fusion platform for autonomous vehicles.
